axis0.name: <%= ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>
axis0.translatedName: <%= ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'Company Code': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'Plant': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'Business Area': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'Profit Center': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'Material': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'Material group': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'Machine type': ''%>

components.title: #{cycleTime} #{by} <%= ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>

components.buttonTitle: <%= ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."BUKRS_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."BUKRS"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."DWERK_TEXT"'?'#{"AFPO"."DWERK"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."GSBER_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."GSBER"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT"'?'#{"AUFK"."PRCTR"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'?'#{"material"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"AFPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'?'#{"materialGroup"}': ButtonDrilldown2 == '"CRHD"."MATYP"'?'#{"CRHD"."MATYP"}': ''%>

variables.name: differencePlannedActualFinish
variables.value:

formula.text:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT")=1 THEN "AUFK"."PRCTR" 
ELSE "AUFK"."PRCTR" || ' - ' || "AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT" 
END

formula.text:
CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("AFPO"."XLOEK") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "AFPO"."XLOEK" = 'X' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "AFPO"."XLOEK"
END
